description:
Half-Life Advanced Effects (HLAE) is a tool to enrich Source (mainly CS:GO) engine based movie making.


- Included AfxHookSource2 0.31.0 (2025-03-24T18:18Z).
- Updated installer (HLAE_Setup.exe) to WiX toolset v5.
AfxHookSource2 0.31.0 (2025-03-24T18:18Z)
- Added mirv_endofmatch by @ChetdeJong - default is 1 (enabled), set to 0 to disable the scene in the end of match/demo.
